text:
Hi Christine, a little late to the party but wanted to confirm this for you. For the new drag-and-drop email builder, with the built in templates we strive for support for the following outlook clients:
Outlook 2003 - Windows 7
Outlook 2007 - Windows 7
Outlook 2010 - Windows 7
Outlook 2010 (120 dpi) - Windows 7
Outlook 2011 - OSX 10.8
Outlook 2013 - Windows 7
Outlook 2013 (120 dpi) - Windows 7
Outlook 2016 - Windows 7
Outlook 2016 - Windows 10
There's some small pieces that gracefully degrade in the older of old ones, but for the most part they should work :+1:
